name: upwork-ai-assistant
description: Upwork AI Assistant - комплексне рішення для автоматизації роботи з Upwork

scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
scripts.test:integration: cd tests/integration && python3.11 -m pytest -v || echo 'Integration tests not implemented yet'
scripts.test:e2e: cd tests/e2e && npx playwright test || echo 'E2E tests not implemented yet'
scripts.test:security: cd tests/security && python3.11 -m pytest -v || echo 'Security tests not implemented yet'
scripts.test:full: npm run test:all && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:performance && npm run test:security
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start" "cd app/frontend && npm start"
scripts.clean: cd app/backend && docker-compose down -v && docker system prune -f

author: Upwork AI Assistant Team
